options.accessiblestep.title: Accessible Step
options.accessiblestep.autojump.tooltip: Jump when approaching a full block
options.accessiblestep.step.tooltip: Step up smoothly when approaching a full block
options.accessiblestep.height.tooltip: Height (in blocks) that can be stepped up smoothly when walking
options.accessiblestep.sneakheight.toolt:
Height (in blocks) that can be stepped up smoothly when sneaking.
Values greater than the configured Step Height will use the Step Height instead
options.accessiblestep.sprintheight.tool:
Height (in blocks) that can be stepped up smoothly when sprinting.
Values smaller than the configured Step Height will use the Step Height instead
